org.jgentleframework.context.services
Interface DomainContextListener

public interface DomainContextListener

Represents the domain context listener that allows for custom behaviour when each domain is added or removed.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com

Method Summary
 void childrenAdded(java.util.Iterator<?> childrenAffected)
          The implementation of this method will be invoked aumatically when each domain is added to context.
 void childrenRemoved(java.util.Iterator<?> childrenAffected)
          The implementation of this method will be invoked automatically when each domain is removed.
 

Method Detail

childrenAdded

void childrenAdded(java.util.Iterator<?> childrenAffected)
The implementation of this method will be invoked aumatically when each domain is added to context.

Parameters:
childrenAffected - the Iterator containing all adding domains.

childrenRemoved

void childrenRemoved(java.util.Iterator<?> childrenAffected)
The implementation of this method will be invoked automatically when each domain is removed.

Parameters:
childrenAffected - the Iterator containing all removed domains.
